GameController - Class in com.java.simonsobstaclecourse.controller
The GameController class manages user interface interactions and controls the game flow.
GameController() - Constructor for class com.java.simonsobstaclecourse.controller.GameController
 
GameView - Class in com.java.simonsobstaclecourse.view
The GameView class is responsible for updating the graphical representation of the game board, displaying information such as the current player, dice values, top players, win messages, and handling user input through the command line interface.
